description:
Steep ice one day, hard dry tooling the next. The updated Dart Crampons feature modular front points that can be configured to short or long mono-points, dual-point, or asymmetrical dual-point depending on what you're climbing on a given day. The lightweight horizontal frame keeps your boot sole close to the ice for precise placements and sensitivity when edging or working your way past aerated ice.

  • Modular front points allow you to configure crampons to your climb
  • Secondary points are swept forward to add stability on funky formations
  • Third row of teeth are inclined backward for purchase when backstepping
  • Front points can be replaced when worn out
  • Leverlock FIL binding system has a toe bail wire with 3 positions to accommodate all sole thicknesses. Can be adjusted to fit asymmetric technical boots
  • Heel bail design with thumb catch is easy to remove
  • Medium linking bar (provided) fits boots sizes 34 to 44
  • Anti-snow plates included
  • Fits boots with toe and heel welts
name: Petzl Dart Leverlock FIL Crampons
